article_title: 90th District campaign finance reports: Money moving West Michigan politics
article_text:
90th District

Candidates answer campaign questions

Candidates for the 90th Michigan House District answered The Sentinel's questions recently to give voters a better picture of their options at ...

article_metadata.description: Ottawa County politics is becoming more of a big-money game. In the lead up to Tuesday’s Republican primary, candidates filed campaign finance reports that paint a picture of their efforts to win a state seat.
article_metadata.author: Andrea.Goodell @HollandSentinel.com (616) 546-4275
